title: Mattel CEO Says SpaceX Deal Was Unexpected
itunes:title: Mattel CEO Says SpaceX Deal Was Unexpected
description:
Mattel CEO Ynon Kreiz discusses the toy company's earnings and partnering with SpaceX tocreate toys and collectibles. Bloomberg News Supply Chain Reporter Augusta Saraiva shares the details of her Businessweek Magazine story The AI Platform Behind a Bezos-Backed Startup’s Vegan Burgers. Kathy Kraninger, VP of Regulatory Affairs at Solidus, talks about regulation for the digital asset market. And we Drive to the Close with Michael Sheldon, Chief Investment Officer at Hightower RDM Financial Group.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
